title: Echoes
description: Lauren is tending a broken heart and striving to finish her collegedegree when she connects with a man who goes by the initials K.C. In asweet, old-fashioned manner their emails become a source of mutualencouragement.An invitation to join some of the women of Glenbrooke on a lavishgetaway provides Lauren with an unexpected choice. She can meet K.C.face to face or she can say nothing and let her life continue as it is.Discover what happens when she listens to the voice that echoes in her heart.
author: Robin Jones Gunn
